mdx.rawBody:
---
Song: uyirin uyirae
Film: kAkka kAkka
---
Notes: s r2 g2 m1 p d1 n2 S

uyirin uyirae...uyirin uyirae nadhiyin madiyil kaathu kidaikindrean
sp m   pp p     mm p   gr s   m m  p   g r s   g  m   g r  n.  s

eera alaigaL neerai vaari mughathil iraithum muzhudhum vaerkindrean
spm  pp  p   m  p   gr s  m m  p    gr  s    g g  m    gr  n.  s

nagarum neruppai kozhundhu vitterindean...
p.g r   g g  g   r r   g   r  s n. s

aNaindha pinbhum...analin maelirundean
p.g  r   g  g      rr g   r  s n. s

kaalaipaniyaaga eNNai vaarikondaay
s  r  g r rs sn.n.s   rs sn.n.m.p.

naeram kooda edhiri aagivida...
p.g r  g  g  rr  g  r s n.s

yughaNgaL aaga vaedam maarivida...
p.g   r   g g  r  g   r  s n.s

aNaiththu kondaayae...pinbhu yaenoa sendraay
ss    r   gr rs sn.   n. s   rs sn. n.m.p.

(uyirin uyirae)

Stanza 1:
swAsamindri thavikkirEnE
p.ss s   s  n3.n3.n.d.p.

unadhu mooCHil pizhaikkirEnE 
p.ss   s  s    n3.n3. n.d.p.

idhazhgaLai idhazhgaLAl nirappida vA peNNE
p.m.  p.n.  p.m.  p.n3. p.m. p.s  r  g  m

ninaivu engO neendhi chella 
p.s  s  s s  n3. n.  d.  p.

kanavu vandhu kaNNai kiLLa 
p.m.p. sn3.rs n3. n. d. p.

nizhaledhu nijamedhu kuzhambinEn vA peNNE
p.m. p.n.  p.m.p.n3. p.m.  p.s   r  g  m

kAtril endhan kaigaL reNdum
sm m   m pm   gr gr  s  s

unnai andri yArai thEdum
sm m  md pm gr gr s  s

vilagi pOgAdhE  tholaindhu pOvEnE    nAn...nAn...nAn
s s r  grrs sn. n. n.  s   rssn.n.m. p.    p.    p.d.n.srgmp

(uyirin uyirae)

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
iravin poarvai yeNNai suzhundhu...
mella mella moodum thazhndhu
vidiyalai thaedinean
uNNidam vaa peNNae
paadhamengum saavin raNangaL
naragamaaghum kaadhal kaNangaL
orumurai madiyilae uranguvean vaa peNNae
thaamadhikkum ovoru kaNamum
thavaNai muraiyil maraNam nighazhum
arigil vaarayoa viralgaL thaarayoa

(uyirin uyirae)
(nagarum neruppai)
